thread.title: Unrest in Nigeria could cost Buhari re-election

title: Unrest in Nigeria could cost Buhari re-election
text:
Unrest in Nigeria could cost Buhari re-election 7:53am BST - 01:27 
Nigeria’s President Muhammadu Buhari confirmed on Monday he will seek another term in elections next year, ending months of speculation about his future after bouts of ill health.   
Nigeria’s President Muhammadu Buhari confirmed on Monday he will seek another term in elections next year, ending months of speculation about his future after bouts of ill health.  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/04/13/unrest-in-nigeria-could-cost-buhari-re-e?videoId=417354156&videoChannel=13422
